mapper.select: /* M_Broadcast.xml - callBroadList */ SELECT b.subject_type , b.title , b.start_date , b.end_date , b.airtime , m.listener , m.good , m.gold , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum FROM rd_data.tb_broadcast_room b , rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting m , (SELECT @RNUM := #{pageStart}) r WHERE b.room_no = m.room_no ORDER BY ${tableColumnName} ${orderDir} limit #{pageStart}, #{pageCnt}

/* M_Broadcast.xml - callBroadHistory_detail */ SELECT b.room_no as roomNo ,(SELECT aa.code From rd_data.tbl_code_define aa WHERE aa.type='subject_type' and aa.value = lpad(b.subject_type,2,'0')) as subjectType , b.title as title , DATE_FORMAT(b.start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as startDate , DATE_FORMAT(b.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endDate , TIME_FORMAT(SEC_TO_TIME(m.airtime), '%H시간 %i분 %s초') as airtime , m.listener as listener , m.good , m.gold , b.state as state , (CASE b.state WHEN 1 THEN '방송중(Mic On)' WHEN 2 THEN '방송준비중(Mic Off)' WHEN 3 THEN '통화중' WHEN 4 THEN '방송종료' ELSE '비정상(DJ종료된 상태' end) AS status , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum FROM rd_data.tb_broadcast_room b, rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting m , (SELECT @RNUM := #{pageStart}) r WHERE b.room_no = m.room_no AND b.mem_no = #{memNo}
ORDER BY ${tableColumnName} ${orderDir} limit #{pageStart}, #{pageCnt}
